item.title: Richscape diag
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Ok im adding Dialogue to a npc and this is my code

	case 599:
		npcDiag("","Hello!","Would you like a make-over?","It will cosst 3,000 gold",599);	
		break;

	case 600:
		playerDiag("Yea,", "i'm fucking ugly take 3k");
		break;

	case 601:
		if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 3000)==true) {
		deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 3000);
		showInterface(3559);
		apset = true;
	   		} else {
		npcDiag("You do not have enuf gold for this", "");
		}
		break;

And yes its in the right place.

and i get this error.

.\client.java:15114: npcDiag(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,
java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,java.lang
.String)
                npcDiag("You do not have enuf gold for this", "");
                ^
Note: .\stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Any help? and please only post if you know what your doing i don’t want lot’s of idiot’s posting crap like “did you put it in client.java” …yes its fucking in the client class.

Read full topic
